page.title: 12Popular Food and Drinks
page.content: We did a survey on which was peoples' favourite food and drinks in our school (age 4-11). The most popular drink was fizzy ones especially coke but in the middle ages (7-9) they like blackcurrent and orange as well as coke. For breakfast people like corflakes, frosties (sugar coated cornflakes), rice crispies and cocopops (coco flavoured rice crispies). Some 6 year olds liked toast better than the cereal. For dinner the younger ones (4-6) liked fish and chips but it changed to roast as they got older. Even the teachers liked roast. There is no marked preference in types of pudding but ice cream came slightly ahead and so did apple crumble and apple pie.
